actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to repeal the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to reduce the rate of price support applicable to milk, and to grant to the Secretary authority to make additional contracts to reduce milk production through the period ending March 31, 1986.
short_title: Dairy Farmers' Self Help Act of 1985

summary.text: Dairy Farmers' Self Help Act of 1985 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to repeal the Secretary of Agriculture's authority to reduce the milk price support rates, as of April 1 and July 1, 1985. Extends the milk production reduction program through March 31, 1986.

titles.title: Dairy Farmers' Self Help Act of 1985

A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to repeal the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to reduce the rate of price support applicable to milk, and to grant to the Secretary authority to make additional contracts to reduce milk production through the period ending March 31, 1986.
